festiveCollections.name: Diwali Opulence Collection
festiveCollections.description: Illuminate celebrations with our curated gift hampers featuring handcrafted diyas, premium dry fruits, and artisanal sweets packaged in silk-lined boxes with gold embossing.

festiveCollections.name: Ethereal Rakshabandhan
festiveCollections.description: Celebrate sibling bonds with our personalized rakhi sets featuring semi-precious stones, accompanied by artisanal chocolates and customized message scrolls.

weddingGifting.name: Eternal Union Collection
weddingGifting.description: Commemorate the sacred union with personalized keepsake boxes featuring the couple's monogram, filled with luxury self-care products, champagne flutes, and customized mementos.

weddingGifting.name: Heritage Trousseau
weddingGifting.description: Honor tradition with our bespoke collection of handcrafted textiles, heirloom-quality jewelry boxes, and artisanal home accents designed for new beginnings.

corporateGifting.name: Executive Appreciation
corporateGifting.description: Elevate business relationships with our premium desk accessories, personalized stationery, and curated gourmet experiences packaged in luxurious presentation boxes.

corporateGifting.name: Client Milestone Celebrations
corporateGifting.description: Mark important achievements with customized gift sets featuring premium leather goods, exclusive beverages, and artisanal chocolates with your company's branding.

personas.name: Affluent Aesthete
personas.description: High-net-worth individuals aged 35-55 who value exclusivity, craftsmanship, and unique experiences. They are discerning collectors who see gifting as an extension of their personal brand.

personas.name: Cultural Connoisseur
personas.description: Global Indians aged 30-45 who deeply value their cultural heritage while embracing modern luxury. They seek gifts that tell a story and reflect both traditional values and contemporary elegance.

personas.name: Corporate Curator
personas.description: Business leaders and HR professionals responsible for maintaining client and employee relationships through thoughtful gifting programs that reflect company values.

marketingCampaigns.name: Illuminate & Celebrate
marketingCampaigns.concept: An immersive campaign highlighting how BlingxBeyond gifts illuminate relationships, featuring cinematic visuals of families unwrapping luxurious gift boxes that literally illuminate when opened.
marketingCampaigns.tagline: When Moments Shine Brighter Than Lights

marketingCampaigns.name: Love Transcends
marketingCampaigns.concept: A sophisticated campaign focusing on the art of expressing love through thoughtfully curated gifts, emphasizing the emotional journey from selection to delivery.

marketingCampaigns.name: Heritage in Harmony
marketingCampaigns.concept: A campaign celebrating the blend of tradition and contemporary luxury in wedding gifting, featuring real couples and their gifting stories.
